verses.verse: Behold, I will <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H4397>messenger<s%>, and he shall <S%H6437>prepare<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: and the <S%H113>Lord<s%>, whom ye <S%H1245>seek<s%>, shall <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H1964>temple<s%>, even the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, whom ye <S%H2655>delight<s%> in: behold, he shall <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

But who may <S%H3557>abide<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H935>coming<s%>? and who shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> when he <S%H7200>appeareth<s%>? for he is like a <S%H6884>refiner's<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>, and like <S%H3526>fullers'<s%> <S%H1287>soap<s%>:

And he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> as a <S%H6884>refiner<s%> and <S%H2891>purifier<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>: and he shall <S%H2891>purify<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, and <S%H2212>purge<s%> them as <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, that they may <S%H5066>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

Then shall the <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> be <S%H6149>pleasant<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>, and as in <S%H6931>former<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And I will come <S%H7126>near<s%> to you to <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; and I will be a <S%H4116>swift<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against the <S%H3784>sorcerers<s%>, and against the <S%H5003>adulterers<s%>, and against <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H7650>swearers<s%>, and against those that <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H7916>hireling<s%> in his <S%H7939>wages<s%>, the <S%H490>widow<s%>, and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and that turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> from his right, and <S%H3372>fear<s%> not me, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
For I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I <S%H8138>change<s%> not; therefore ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> are not <S%H3615>consumed<s%>.

¶ Even from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> ye are gone <S%H5493>away<s%> from mine <S%H2706>ordinances<s%>, and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> them. <S%H7725>Return<s%> unto me, and I will <S%H7725>return<s%> unto you, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>. But ye <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherein shall we <S%H7725>return<s%>?

¶ Will a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6906>rob<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>? Yet ye have <S%H6906>robbed<s%> me. But ye <S%H559>say<s%>, Wherein have we <S%H6906>robbed<s%> thee? In <S%H4643>tithes<s%> and <S%H8641>offerings<s%>.
Ye are <S%H779>cursed<s%> with a <S%H3994>curse<s%>: for ye have <S%H6906>robbed<s%> me, even this whole <S%H1471>nation<s%>.

<S%H935>Bring<s%> ye all the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> into the <S%H214>storehouse<s%>, that there may be <S%H2964>meat<s%> in mine <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H974>prove<s%> me now <S%H2063>herewith<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, if I will not <S%H6605>open<s%> you the <S%H699>windows<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and pour you <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>, that there shall not be room <S%H1767>enough<s%> to receive it.

And I will <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> the <S%H398>devourer<s%> for your sakes, and he shall not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6529>fruits<s%> of your <S%H127>ground<s%>; neither shall your <S%H1612>vine<s%> cast her <S%H7921>fruit<s%> before the time in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
And all <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall call you <S%H833>blessed<s%>: for ye shall be a <S%H2656>delightsome<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
¶ Your <S%H1697>words<s%> have been <S%H2388>stout<s%> against me, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. Yet ye <S%H559>say<s%>, What have we <S%H1696>spoken<s%> so much against thee?

Ye have <S%H559>said<s%>, It is <S%H7723>vain<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>: and what <S%H1215>profit<s%> is it that we have <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H4931>ordinance<s%>, and that we have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6941>mournfully<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>?

And now we <S%H833>call<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> <S%H833>happy<s%>; yea, they that <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> are set <S%H1129>up<s%>; yea, they that <S%H974>tempt<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> are even <S%H4422>delivered<s%>.

¶ Then they that <S%H3373>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> spake <S%H1696>often<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7181>hearkened<s%>, and <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and a <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H2146>remembrance<s%> was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him for them that <S%H3373>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and that <S%H2803>thought<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And they shall be mine, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, in that <S%H3117>day<s%> when I make <S%H6213>up<s%> my <S%H5459>jewels<s%>; and I will <S%H2550>spare<s%> them, as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2550>spareth<s%> his own <S%H1121>son<s%> that <S%H5647>serveth<s%> him.

Then shall ye <S%H7725>return<s%>, and <S%H7200>discern<s%> between the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, between him that <S%H5647>serveth<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and him that <S%H5647>serveth<s%> him not.
